00238 template <class InputIterator>
00239 MDPRef MDP::create(InputIterator actions_begin, InputIterator actions_end,
00240                    const AveragerRef &averager)
00241 {
00242   MDPRef result(new MDP(actions_begin, actions_end, averager));
00243   result->m_this = result;
00244   return result;
00245 }
